UsagePrdGrantBindingPolicy.name: UsagePrdGrantBindingPolicy
UsagePrdGrantBindingPolicy.description: Represents the association of a usage resource's grants with a sellable product.

GrantBindingTargetType.description: The type of binding instance to which the grant is added.

GrantBindingType.description: The type of binding that indicates where the grant is added.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated identifier for the usage product grant binding policy.

Product2Id.description: The sellable product associated with the usage product grant binding policy.
